website_summaries.verdict: The best matte primer for completely blurring imperfections.
pros: Effectively covers large pores, especially on the nose
Light formula is easy to apply, goes on smoothly without balling or clumping
Keeps oily skin matte throughout the day
Stops foundation and concealer from creasing
cons: Formula tends to emphasize dry, flaky patches of skin

customer_reviews.title: The smell and colour are terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on YouTube reviews which claimed it was one of the best. First off, it has a really unappealing scent which, considering that it's on your face, is not ideal. It's also tinted a fairly orange colour which doesn't match my skin at all and discoloured my foundation. I've only tried four different types of this this kind of product and haven't found any to be great but this was the worst so far and the most expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Long

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was a fake. I have the authentic one from Sephora and compares the two the font is different on this one, so is the wording and it doesn't perform well at all like the authentic one does.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I've finally found a primer I like!
customer_reviews.text: Don't be alarmed by the tan color of the primer. It melts into your skin flawlessly with no distinct deposit of color leaving a very soft finish. My powder foundation goes on top and blends perfectly. There is no weird splotchy spots or funky residue or mixing oddly with a base that I've experienced with other primers. And best of all I really do notice a difference in how my foundation looks, feels and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Heyzues

customer_reviews.title: This is a counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: Buy from an authorized dealer. This is counterfeit, and the ingredients are not the same as the original, which is actually a really great skin safe product that contains no parabens. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Love this Primer
customer_reviews.text: Love this Primer. I'm in my late 30s and started noticing my pores more and an oily t-zone. I had gone to Sephora and tried something they recommended and I ended up hating it because it pulled all my eye makeup off and made me look like a raccoon. I tried this based on some reviews I read and it is awesome. Reduces pore appearance and keeps my t zone matte all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pore Minimizer and Face Primer.
customer_reviews.text: Ever since a boyfriend in college made a comment about my "large pores", I have tried to find products to minimize them. Dr. Brandt's Pores No More Pore Refiner is amazing. I have very oily skin and many of the pore refining products have left me with acne - NOT this one. It glides on smooth and fills in my pores to help produce a smoother look . LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: DeborahK

customer_reviews.title: Really lives up to the name
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came in a larger tube. I use it every day, mostly to replace foundation but also works well under foundation. It really does make my pores disappear and provides a smooth surface for whatever makeup I wear. I have tried many primers and had issues with kind of a crumbling when I covered with foundation. None of the others minimized my pores and several added a glittery look which I did not care for. My only complaints are the size of the tube and it is a little pricey. Will that prevent future purchases? No. In fact I just ordered two so I will never run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a fair job reducing pore size and clear blackheads
customer_reviews.text: Does a fair job of reducing the appearance of pores. It conceals about 75%, but it’s much more effective than any other brands I’ve tried. It leaves a light, cool sensation. Not greasy at all, and even though it’s tinted, it’s a very neutral color and it blends in with various skin tones. Some people complained about the scent in their reviews, but I actually really like it. It’s a soft tea-tree scent, so it smells really clean. In addition, I’ve been using it daily for about 3 weeks and have noticed my blackheads diminishing. Will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Slasher

customer_reviews.title: Great Pore Softener
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff. Great quality, soft, fresh scent of essential oils, really nice light coverage. Great price for the same product at Sephora, much less expensive, I'll order from this seller every time at that price! Really does a great job of covering and softening pores.
customer_reviews.author: SpadeUser

customer_reviews.title: Best primer on the market
customer_reviews.text: Excellent primer, smooth and wonderful, actually DOES reduce pore size. There is also a mask, Dr Brandt vacuum cleaner and that product and this one are the best products I have ever used for pore reduction. My pores are huge and I’ve tried endless products before finding this one. I am a customer for life and recommend this product to anyone seeking pore reduction. It can even be worn without makeup. It is light and airy and wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Color is darker than sample
customer_reviews.text: They should tell you their cream color varies. I have fair skin and the sample color worked fine so I ordered this regular priced one. I received a darker color product. It fills my pores like the sample one did, but makes me look like I have orange dots on my face. This purchase was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect primer!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the search for the perfect primer. I tried sample after sample, bought mini's, and so many other trials until I found this! I love Dr. Brandt products. This primer goes on silky and smooth. Your face feels like a soft powder and so silky. Makeup just glides on. It also keeps me matte all day and I have very oily skin. I'm highly satisfied and I highly recommend! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dussia-Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Creamy & Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Got a sample of this product in a gift bag from Ulta. Loved it and ordered a full size. I won't be without. Air smooth, light color coverage resulting in perfect feel of moisture and coverage. I wear alone without makeup. So glad I found this product. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable improvement in size!
customer_reviews.text: I never expect these 'miracle products' to work... but I'll say this.... worth the buy!! I have huge pores and even the best makeup doesn't cover it. I hate wearing a lot of foundation anyway. This product made my pores much smaller on contact. I'm pleasantly surprised and will always use this product before makeup or going barefaced.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Martin

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great! Holds powder and liquid foundation in place all ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Holds powder and liquid foundation in place all day, and smooths the skin nicely. In summer, I will wear this with just a dab or two of concealer and skip the foundation, since it evens my skin tone well. It's pricey, but I'm willing to pay a little more for a good product, and you only need a tiny bit. The one ounce tube lasts me about six months with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: MeminyB

customer_reviews.title: Yeah no
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the same product. I have used this for 10 years and buy it every few months. I have some left and this bottle is different and the product t is much thinner. This is not authentic and I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: onceuponatime

customer_reviews.title: Not the legitimate brand
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought this from a beauty store, and this one is NOT dr Brandt! Smells like toilet bowl cleaner and gave me a rash. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Have bought 5 times!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this 5 times. I have oily skin and large pores and it’s like a miracle. It evens my skin and diminishes the look of my pores. Looooove it! Just wish it was a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the way this made my face feel! I have been searching for a product that would bring my skin alive....this definitely was it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail pore filling primer
customer_reviews.text: Holy grail for those who suffer from HUGE pores. For a mattifying primer it’s not very dry. I definitely recommend moisterizer before, but it’s wonderful. I’ve tried every pore filling primer out there and this takes the cake for sure! And this price is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Polan

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite primer ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite primer ever!! I have very oily skin and this product does a good job at keeping my skin matte all day. It doesn't dry my skin out or make it feel to dry like some of the other matte primers I've used. I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davin

customer_reviews.title: Better than you would believe!  Seriously!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Anyone who hates the visibility of pores on her face needs this! I use it mainly in my nose. As a matter of fact I was getting a facial in the office of a plastic surgeon and the nurse doing facial recommended it to me! I’ll be eternally grateful to her!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael S.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that I've found on the market that actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, really covers up nasty pores. Just pat on and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: GOTTA HAVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product over and over.... This is probably my 10th purchase of PORES NO MORE, although I haven't purchased all of them here. I haven't found anything that hides my pores as well as this product does. I am a skin care specialist. A product-junkie. This isn't a CURE. This is a COVER-UP.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Aubry

customer_reviews.title: This does the best job of camouflaging them and leaving a nice even ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very special product. I've always had large pores in the center of my face. This does the best job of camouflaging them and leaving a nice even look to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dory West

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s just ok for the money. It does help conceal my huge pores! However, it’s very matte, a bit thick, doesn’t have light reflectors and it only comes in one color, so it doesn’t match my skin when tan. I’ve been using Tula Face Filter on top of it. Doubtful I will buy again considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: While a little bit pricey, I love this product and the coverage it provides. Not too heavy but gives great coverage on my skin! Glad I found this on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Riggins

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and poreless!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it smooths my face under my foundation. Makes for a gorgeous complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: No more pores. Really.
customer_reviews.text: Dr. Brandt's Refiner Primer is so good, you'll forget to top it off with makeup, as I did the first time I used it. In fact, it's all I use when I want just a little coverage (to yoga, grocery store, dentist et al). Color seems to be universal and it smells divine!
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Larue

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value- First sample was from Ipsy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of THE nicest products I’ve ever used!! It’s silky smooth, goes on beautifully and makes your makeup glide on. It’s not heavy or greasy. It’s tinted a bit but in no way tinted when it’s on. I was wishing it was but it isn’t. Fabulous product and the size is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Pores no more, shine no more
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product, I have shiny, oily skin which is producing oil by midday equivalent of a small middle east country... This reduces that, as well as my pores which are getting larger for some reason (age? :) it has a tint but blends in with any skin color easy and especially if you use foundation over it... I am a true believer in it. Thanks Dr Brandt
customer_reviews.author: Serena0205

customer_reviews.title: It is hands down the best primer I have ever found that makes my pores ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have large pores you should try this! It is hands down the best primer I have ever found that makes my pores nearly invisible. It has a slight tint, so on occasion I will just were it with a loose powder and my skin looks super smooth and it hides any blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Clevingergirl

customer_reviews.title: Thanks again, Dr. Brandt.
customer_reviews.text: As with most skin products, one must take some time to see what happens in different situations. I found this to be my 'go-to' for shiny areas in my T-zone. This was my third purchase of Pores No More, so it definitely works well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Hermes219

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite and most of to primer for my super oily ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite and most of to primer for my super oily and large pores. This primer pairs well with my ester Lauder foundation. Great buy and cheaper through Amazon!! I usually paid $22 at Ulta or sephora for a 2oz. Size tube.
customer_reviews.author: Katina

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation primer
customer_reviews.text: This item is extremely high priced for the oz. you get but I love the product so I buy it anyway. It is the best product I have found for this purpose. I have used many different foundation primers and this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Beach

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I hate feeling like I have makeup on and this stuff is AMAZING! You don't even feel it and it works wonderfully. I just put my powder foundation over the top and love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: This product produced fantastic results. I have combination to oily skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product produced fantastic results. I have combination to oily skin and have enlarged pores especially on my T- zone. After cleansing and moisturizing my face I apply this product and it instantly transforms the skin into a smooth canvas after which I apply makeup. A definite must try for all potential buyers!
customer_reviews.author: Cakist

customer_reviews.title: YASSSSS
customer_reviews.text: Like my header says, YASSSSS. I have huge pores around my nose and I have an oily t-zone. I heard about this from Nicole Guerrero on YouTube a few years back and have been faithful to it ever since. This primer is so good that I will wear it alone, without makeup and people say my skin looks amazing. That's how good it is at blurring EVERYTHING and it keeps me matte! LIKE YASSSSS
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and price. I normally get these types of products off Ebay but the 2 day shipping won this time since the prices were equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Bornitz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I found my new favorite primer! This product makes my skin look amazing! I love the fact that one of its ingredients is teatree oil. My acneic oily skin majorly benefits from this. This is a new must have in my makeup bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It goes on smooth without a greasy or shiny finish. Evens out my complexion without fear of getting on my clothes. Has a unique smell that you get use to easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bev - Boca

customer_reviews.title: It’s make-up...
customer_reviews.text: It’s def make-up. Bought it thinking it would physically shrink my pores instead of cover them up. Ended up giving it to my girlfriend instead. They don’t make it very clear in the posting.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8rboyCUL8rboy

customer_reviews.title: I like that there is a tint to it
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning and it makes my pores invisible! I like that there is a tint to it. I don't use foundation anymore, just this, but it does serve as a great primer for make up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste time or money
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced the the pic isn't two things it's one and it's box and it is extremely small, smaller that hotel lotions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price work great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!!! My face is super shiny even after I wash it. It matters the shine and helps give a smooth look over my big pours. Best price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Caza

customer_reviews.title: I have tried it and it works alright but is not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that this was tinted until I opened it. I prefer a primer without color. I have tried it and it works alright but is not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: lynda kosnik

customer_reviews.title: i absolutely love the texture that I get when I use the ...
customer_reviews.text: i have had problems iwth pores and oily face since i can remember , i absolutely love the texture that I get when I use the cream. it is not miracle my pores are still there but they are not as visible and it keeps my skin from getting oily . it is very light and a little bit goes a long way ! i will buy it again !!
customer_reviews.author: IYBENFORD

customer_reviews.title: OMG! The best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love this product! It hides pores so well on my nose. It has beige tint, very lightweight. It doesn't clog your pores , just covers them nicely. I use it under my foundation. The bottle should last you about 6 month with everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: CaliFam

customer_reviews.title: It's good. Works to cover up pores
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Works to cover up pores, and blends into my skin well and I have medium/dark skin. A little bit goes a long way. Not heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks just like make up foundation.I thought it would be more medicinal and less cosmetic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grace
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this product to blur and blend the look of pores to create a silky canvas for makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: I don't like this product
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this product, it goes on like makeup, heavy and not the coverage of pores I get from the Clinique products.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: feels like nothing, looks so natural not like heavy makeup
customer_reviews.text: no breakouts, light evening coverage, lovely for every day, no heavy feeling, feels like nothing, looks so natural not like heavy makeup, I don't wear foundation though because i don't like the heavy feeling or looking like I'm wearing makeup
customer_reviews.author: Momtotwobeauties

customer_reviews.title: The best primer ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loooove this stuff. The best primer ive used and may i say ive tryed them all! But this 1 is defenatly worth the money spent! It last a long time also .
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: I found it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I found the BEST primer for my oily face. I'm beyond happy with the product and the quality is amazing. I think the quantity for the price is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: 3dega1

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a year now, sugested by a Sephora employee and it works perfect for my oily skin. I use it when I don't want to apply fundation in the monring.
customer_reviews.author: karinavrs

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is really good but does not cove pores 100%

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bough this for my friend and she loved it

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure it's not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this product is the real deal. I had a sampler from Sephora that had a nicer consistency and evened texture better. Also had small hiccups with delivery. Otherwise, it's a not-bad skin product that does help minimize the appearance of pores somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this in a play box..um its fantastic. I love putting it on top of my make up for a mid day freshen up, it keeps oil at bay! so then I came here and bought a full size! its so great!

customer_reviews.title: I have had very oily skin all my life, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had very oily skin all my life, and this is the only matte product I've found that does what you hope it will do.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt do what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: I had read some good reviews about this product so I bought it. But didn't work for me. It was to drying and made my pores look worse. And my pores are not even that bad.Definitely did not do what it states. I do not recommend this product. I got it on time so that's why I'm even giving it any stars at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marysol G

customer_reviews.title: Fyi: product is tinted.  I would say tan or medium.
customer_reviews.text: This product is tinted. I wasn't expecting a product with color. I was expecting a clear or white product. I haven't used it often enough yet to know if I like it. But I think I would have liked it better colorless. Fyi
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Boyette

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law. And she loves it. She always use this product.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing and really helps to dramatically reduce the appearance of ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and really helps to dramatically reduce the appearance of sebatious filaments. It's one of my must have products.

customer_reviews.title: I would  not buy again !
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin feel really soft and smooth but I'm not 100% sold on it eliminating the appearance of skin pores.
customer_reviews.author: linda freer

customer_reviews.title: Repurchasing
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Leaves my skin softly matte and the green and white tea gets rid of a lot of redness. Really makes my skin look good under makeup. Will be buying again!

customer_reviews.title: Dont exect quick results.
customer_reviews.text: The way this is marketed you think one application would give you some airbrushed look. It does not! I don't know if with long term use that will improve but so far, its little more than a mattifying cream.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My go-to facial product everyday. Leaves my pores covered, more refined, and my skin looking smooth and young.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best primer, I have years using this product, I love it, I put on my face everyday under makeup

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pores, Yes Pores
customer_reviews.text: Advertises to minimize pores, but it doesn't! I have large pores, my pores look the same after applying this product. It does leave my skin silky, but that is not why I purchased the product. Pores, yes I still see my pores as large as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I've bought this and I am pretty happy with it. I can definitely tell a difference when I put this stuff on. it improves the look of my complexion and prevents my face from becoming shiny.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife told me that she was very pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: A little really does work all day and controls oil great Worth the price.

customer_reviews.text: Smooths out my skin/pores perfectly. Love the matte finish. Keeps makeup on all day.

customer_reviews.title: Can't say my pores look smaller but definitely a good primer or to wear by itself
customer_reviews.text: Can't say my pores look smaller but definitely a good primer or to wear by itself. Takes care of that shiny/oily look.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it once and I liked it, plan to use it again this evening. It left skin feeling clean and smooth.

customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says. This refiner smooths over the surface of the skin to allow makeup to enhance the face and not settle in the pores. Needs to be part of any makeup routine.

customer_reviews.title: Its like an IRL insta filter
customer_reviews.text: Caveat Emptor: This seems to not be the original Dr Brandt formula. You get what you pay for. That being said, it offered similar coverage and pore filling capabilities. Its like an IRL insta filter. Would buy again, even though its fake. Seriously, I compared ingredients.

customer_reviews.title: I love how it feel
customer_reviews.text: I loved it Very smooth and give a very natural clear skin appearance with out foundation

customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years. Seriously hides all your pores for a smooth look :)

customer_reviews.title: ... it dries it has a matte finish which I like. My pores also appear smaller and skin looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Once it dries it has a matte finish which I like. My pores also appear smaller and skin looks more even toned. It isn't a miracle worker, but it helps.
customer_reviews.author: no pen name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An absolute favorite makeup splurge! A must try! Tried a sample from Sephora. LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: ke

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle product for those with acne scars. It goes on smooth and can be worn alone or with makeup. After using it once, I won't leave the house without it. It's not a concealer, but for minor imperfections or discoloration, it works wonders. And it does not cause acne, which is huge concern for me. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SLT

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It works but pricy. I have used alternates but simply not as good as this product. Pores are a real issue with aging men, so I am very cautious what I put on this aging face.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hearty

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product will get right into your pores and cover them and it gives you a smooth look. You may have to do some touch up later in the day because it sinks into the pore.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen A. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, didnt make a difference for me. Never re-bought it.
customer_reviews.author: wiirenet

customer_reviews.title: Super for a base
customer_reviews.text: My GF uses this as a base to refine her pours and she simply raves about it. She is constantly getting comments on her skin and makeup. She says it is all down to Dr. Brandt pours no more.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Liszak

product_meta.title: Dr. Brandt Skincare Pores No More Pore Refiner Primer, 1 fl oz
product_meta.description:
A cult favorite, pores no more pore refiner primer is Dr. Brandt's quick fix for flawless, photo-ready skin. It is the miracle base to create the perfect skin canvas for long-lasting makeup and well-preserved skin. This velvety formula absorbs excess oil, minimizes pores, blurs fine lines and is resistant to sweat and humidity. Prime, touch-up and treat while perfecting your makeup.

BRAND STORY
BY MERGING SCIENCE AND CUTTING EDGE DELIVERY SYSTEMS, WE CREATE PRODUCTS THAT ARE EFFECTIVE AND DELIVER ON THE PROMISE OF LONG LASTING RESULTS AT HOME.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


Hides pores, absorbs oil and mattifies shine

PORES NO MORE REFINER

Dr. Brandt’s quick fix for flawless, photo-ready skin. Instantly hide the appearance of pores and mattify shine. This silky, smooth formula glides onto clean skin or on top of makeup leaving an un-tinted, powder finish.

Hides and refines pores, instantly mattifies shine, and helps regulate oil production.

 * Matte finish
 * Pore-reducing

ABOUT DR. BRANDT SKINCARE
dr. brandt skincare is the natural evolution of Dr. Brandt’s professional dermatology practice and clinical research. Based on Dr. Brandt’s extensive skincare research and innovative office procedures, he has created a technologically advanced skincare line to repair and prevent damage to the skin, while making it healthy and beautiful. Experience skin-changing science, when you take the doctor home with you.




HOW TO USE

Use in the morning after cleansing with Pores No More Cleanser. Can be used on top of your moisturizer and foundation. Re-apply throughout the day as necessary. For best results, use with Pores No More Vacuum Cleaner and Pores No More Pore Thing.


Use in the morning after cleansing with Pores No More Cleanser. Can be used on top of your moisturizer and foundation. Re-apply throughout the day as necessary. For best results, use with Pores No More Vacuum Cleaner and Pores No More Pore Thing.






GET THE LOOK
PORES NO MORE CLEANSER
A non-drying, pore refining cleanser that combines tea tree oil, willow bark and salicylic acid to dissolve impurities and decongest pores, leaving skin with an ultra-clean sensation.

PORES NO MORE VACUUM CLEANER
This gentle exfoliating mask helps loosen and extract blackheads without painful extraction tools while absorbing oil and tightening pores.

PORES NO MORE PORE THING WITH EVERMAT
A pore-tightening memory gel perfect for stubborn t-zone pores. Reduces excess oil, clears pores, and restores pore walls.
